# Composure

## Pronunciation

- /kəmˈpəʊʒə/
- /kəmˈpoʊʒɚ/

## Meanings

### Noun

Calmness of mind or matter, self-possession.

---

The act of composing, or that which is composed; a composition.

---

Orderly adjustment; disposition.

---

Frame; make; temperament.

---

A combination; a union; a bond.
